sra_experiment_id.title: sra_experiment_id
sra_experiment_id.description: Experiment identifier assigned by SRA and linked to GenBank and other databases.

sra_run_id.title: sra_run_id
sra_run_id.description: The SRA run accession for a set of fastq files

bioproject.title: bioproject
bioproject.description: NCBI BioProject DB ID. A BioProject is a collection of biological data for a single initiative, originating from a single organization or from a consortium.

num_of_bases.title: num_of_bases
num_of_bases.description: Number of nucleotides represented in file

source.title: source
source.description: Source of genomic information in the file. From an SRA controled vocabulary: GENOMIC: [Genomic DNA (includes PCR products from genomic DNA)], TRANSCRIPTOMIC: [Transcription products or non genomic DNA (EST, cDNA, RT-PCR, screened libraries)], METAGENOMIC : [Mixed material from metagenome], METATRANSCRIPTOMIC: [Transcription products from community targets], SYNTHETIC: [Synthetic DNA], VIRAL RNA: [Viral RNA], OTHER:[Other, unspecified, or unknown library source material (please include additional info in the ‚Äúdesign description‚Äù)]

strategy.title: strategy
strategy.description: Strategy/method used to generate the NGS. Controled vocabulary consisting of the following terms: WGA WGS WXS RNA-Seq miRNA-Seq WCS CLONE POOLCLONE AMPLICON CLONEEND FINISHING ChIP-Seq MNase-Seq DNase-Hypersensitivity Bisulfite-Seq Tn-Seq EST FL-cDNA CTS MRE-Seq MeDIP-Seq MBD-Seq Synthetic-Long-Read OTHER

selection.title: selection
selection.pattern: (RANDOM|PCR|RANDOM PCR|RT-PCR|HMPR|MF|CF-S|CF-M|CF-H|CF-T|MDA|MSLL|cDNA|ChIP|MNase|DNAse|Hybrid Selection|Reduced Representation|Restriction Digest|5-methylcytidine antibody|MBD2 protein methyl-CpG binding domain|CAGE|RACE|size fractionation|Padlock probes capture method|other|unspecified|cDNA_oligo_dT|cDNA_randomPriming|Inverse rRNA|Oligo-dT|PolyA|repeat fractionation)

instrument.title: instrument
instrument.description: Name of instrument used for NGS.

file_type.title: file_type
file_type.description: Type of file representing the genomic data

percent_reads_unaligned.title: reads_unaligned
percent_reads_unaligned.description: the number of reads that did not align to the reference as a percentage.

identified_reads.title: identified_reads
identified_reads.description: The number of reads that were matched to a reference

taxonomy_id.title: taxonomy_id
taxonomy_id.description: NCBI taxonomy identifier of the organism.

lineage.title: lineage
lineage.description: The complete taxonomic lineage for the taxonomic node indicated.

percent_identified.title: percent_identified
percent_identified.description: The percentage of reads that were matched to a reference

ngs_gc_content.title: gc_content
ngs_gc_content.description: GC content of the individual fastq files in ngsQC.
